column4: I'm trying to use gnome burner to burn an iso to a disk, not the iso file itself but you know what i mean. is that gonna let me? It looks like it wants to burn the file itself not the raw data in the iso
oh, duh. Too used to burning in windows. lol. thanks gusy
are you trying to save the .iso to the CD or create a CD from the .iso?
navigate to the .iso... right click on it... select 'write to disc'
